definitions.body: :Is 58:5 fasting, fast;—´[[ח]] abs. 2Sa 12:16 +, cstr. Zec 8:19 (4 t.); sf. [[חׂמְכֶם]] Is 58:3; pl. [[חוֹמוֹת]] Es 9:31; —fast, as acc. cogn. 2Sa 12:16; public observance 1Ki 21:9, 1Ki 21:12, 2Ch 20:3, Ezr 8:21, Je 36:9, Jon 3:5 (all obj. of [[קָרָא]] proclaim), cf. Joe 1:14, Joe 2:15 (both obj. of [[קַדְּשׁוּ]]); [[יוֹם חוֹם]] Je 36:6, [[יוֹם חׂמְכֶם]] Is 58:3, cf. v:Is 58:5 (‖[[יוֹם עַנּוֹת אָדָם נַפְשׁוֹ]]), v:Is 58:5, v:Is 58:6; of periodic fasts Zec 8:19, Zec 8:19, Zec 8:19, Zec 8:19, Es 9:31; act or state of fasting, [[וּבְשַׂקִּים]] ´[[נֶאֶסְפוּ בְח]] Ne 9:1 cf. Joe 2:12, Da 9:3, Es 4:3; [[נַפְשִׁי]] ´[[עִנֵּיתִי בַצּ]] Ps 35:13 cf. Ps 69:11 (on [[וׇאֶבְכֶּה]] v. Che Bae); causing physical weakness Ps 109:24.
